verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> turned again יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> When the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁיבַ֣ת <WH7870> the captivity צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ <WH1961> become כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃ <WH2492> we were like them that dream

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then יִמָּלֵ֪א <WH4390> filled שְׂח֡וֹק <WH7814> with laughter פִּינוּ֮ <WH6310> Then was our mouth וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֪נוּ <WH3956> and our tongue רִ֫נָּ֥ה <WH7440> with singing אָ֭ז <WH227> Then יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> then said בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> they among the heathen הִגְדִּ֥יל <WH1431> great things יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> hath done עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another
הִגְדִּ֣יל <WH1431> great things יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> hath done עִמָּ֗נוּ <WH5973> with הָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> become שְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <WH8056> for us [whereof] we are glad
שׁוּבָ֣ה <WH7725> Turn again יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבוּתֵנוּ כ] (שְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ <WH7622> captive ק) כַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים <WH650> as the streams בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> in the south
הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים <WH2232> They that sow בְּדִמְעָ֗ה <WH1832> in tears בְּרִנָּ֥ה <WH7440> in joy יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH7114> shall reap

הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ <WH1980> forth יֵלֵ֨ךְ ׀ <WH1980> to and fro וּבָכֹה֮ <WH1058> and weepeth נֹשֵׂ֪א <WH5375> bearing מֶֽשֶׁךְ־ <WH4901> precious הַ֫זָּ֥רַע <WH2233> seed בֹּֽא־ <WH935> shall doubtless יָב֥וֹא <WH935> come בְרִנָּ֑ה <WH7440> again with rejoicing נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א <WH5375> bringing אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃ <WH485> his sheaves
